name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ASSET
description: This table contains information related to assets of a patient mentioned in a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the asset type.

columns.name: ASSET_VALUE
columns.description: The amount the asset is worth.

columns.name: AST_BLNG_PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The patient contact of one of the patients on the case for whom the asset information in the current row belongs to. If the information belongs to a patient on the case,  ASSET_BELONGS_TO_PAT_ID column will be set instead.

columns.name: ASSET_COMMENT
columns.description: A brief comment about the asset information in the current row.
